contextId.information: The ellipsis can be filled in. AT: "show everyone that you are a man" or "live so that everyone can see you are a good man" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
"On the altar" where he placed the wood is assumed in this sentence. AT: "He put the wood for a fire on the altar" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: He arranged the wood for a fire

contextId.information: It is understood that Ben Hadad is speaking to his soldiers. AT: "Ben Hadad said to his soldiers" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The expression "the rest" assumes the words "of the Aramean soldiers." AT: "The rest of the Aramean soldiers" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
